name: Save the Cat! (Dev Room)
description:
Save the cat, and save the universe!

You have to run, fly, or fight to move forward. Move up and down in various ways. Cute space cats are waiting for you to save them.

[Team Name]

DevRoom

[Gameplay Instructions] 

Move : ASDW

Jump : Space

Slide : Left Control

Fire : Left Mouse
